item.description:
My apologies for scheduling the ride the same day as Dan's ride.

For anyone interested, though, we'd like to do another Kidical Mass ride before summer officially begins. This is a mellow, family-friendly ride through the Deering Center neighborhood ending back at the Longfellow playground. The route looks something like this double loop on either side of Stevens Ave.

http://www.mapmyride.com/routes/view/37314218/?open_ive_done=1

Check the facebook event page for details:  http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=117194885032789

The rain date for the ride is the following Saturday, same time and place. Check this site or the FB page for the go/no-go decision if the weather looks questionable.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll congregate in the parking lot near the corner of Pleasant and Stevens
item.name: June Kidical Mass
